SQL.LOAD: SELECT transaction_log_header_id, item_number, response, response_detail, xml_claim_number, xml_claim_status, xml_reason_close_code, xml_labor_amount, xml_trip_amount, xml_shipping, xml_approved_quote_date, xml_invoice_number, xml_invoice_processed_date, modified_date, modified_by, created_date, created_by, trans_dtl_clm_updte_2gvs_id FROM elp_trans_dtl_clm_updte_2gvs WHERE trans_dtl_clm_updte_2gvs_id = :trans_dtl_clm_updte_2gvs_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_trans_dtl_clm_updte_2gvs SET transaction_log_header_id = :transaction_log_header_id, item_number = :item_number, response = :response, response_detail = :response_detail, xml_claim_number = :xml_claim_number, xml_claim_status = :xml_claim_status, xml_reason_close_code = :xml_reason_close_code, xml_labor_amount = :xml_labor_amount, xml_trip_amount = :xml_trip_amount, xml_shipping = :xml_shipping, xml_approved_quote_date = :xml_approved_quote_date, xml_invoice_number = :xml_invoice_number, xml_invoice_processed_date = :xml_invoice_processed_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE trans_dtl_clm_updte_2gvs_id = :trans_dtl_clm_updte_2gvs_id
